document_data.caption: A ''camouflaged'' [[gray dwarf]] [[ranger]] awaits his prey.
document_data.name: Camouflage
document_data.Effects: As mentioned above, ''camouflage'' allowed the caster to blend in with the surrounding. This was done by changing the caster's and caster's belongings' coloration to that of the surrounding. It merely enhanced the caster's mundane hiding abilities and was not a form of ''[[invisibility]]''.

Appendix.Further reading: *{{Cite dragon/235/Arcane Lore: Spells of the Scaled}}
